channel.title: Nonsensical newspaper report
channel.description:
For a bit of coursework I've gotta write a two page document. There are no reqs for what it can be about and it can be completely nonsensical, but has to be completely written by me.
You guys got any funny, but acceptable, newspaper articles that I could write? Something easy and laidback that's quite funny. I have a couple of ideas, but none are really that funny. Gotta be accepted by my lecturer so nothing offensive.

item.title: Nonsensical newspaper report
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

The local Taco Bell caught fire after they put too much chilly into a taco.

Read full topic

item.title: Nonsensical newspaper report
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

write a story about someone overdosing on marijuana cigarettes

Read full topic

item.title: Nonsensical newspaper report
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Make up an outrageous story about Kinect or something, since it’s hot news (just came out) and it’s such a monumentally stupid idea you should be able to think of something silly. Like when the Wii came out and people launched controllers at their TVs by accident.

Maybe you can do something similar but have someone jump out of an open window or something… plenty of things you could come up with

Read full topic

item.description:

The Onion
